title: Will Riot Ever Fix Soraka's Skin Color In Her Splash?
body:
Title says it all, Sorka has blue skin yet in her Classic, Celestine, and Order of the Banana splashes she has purple skin. im hoping its fixed with the global splash update there are doing. its not like id take an hour to fix. -.-

on the plus side they got her skin color right in her Reaper splash.  =D

replies.body:
Heya Starraka! 

To my knowledge, we don't have plans to made adjustments to this particular splash. While we do have plans to update other splashes, they are a bit worse off in terms of quality, as compared to more current splash, which is why something like this wouldn't be prioritized at the time. 

For a bit of context, it would take a bit more than an hour. :) In addition to hand editing the original PSD file, we also need to slice the image again for all loading screens, store cards, etc.

Could there ever be a time where you'd actually prioritize to go over splashes that could use very small adjustments?  Master Yi having an ENTIRELY different armor/clothes in his base splash has always been a pet peeve for me.

That's a bit harder to say - I don't work directly with the team who works on updating all of the splashes. In a perfect world, yes. We are working to update all splashes for larger scale reworks, such as Poppy, as you've seen, to better showcase what the content in-game looks like.
didnt think id take so much work for the 1 splash, let alone the other 2. mabye you should just make Sorka's skin color purple in game instead. lol  =)
I'd rather they change her in game skin to purple.
She only appears purple in her classic splash art because she using magic that glows purple in it.

the amount of light the magic seems to create wouldnt make her entire body look purple though as the light is mostly blocked by her hand and given the angle wouldnt at all make her arm and shoulder look purple.

this dosnt excuse the fact that the other 2 skins i mentioned she has purple skin
